Sentencas: A three-dimensional mathematical model of a solid oxide fuel cell is presented, which allows the computation of the local distributions of the electrical potential, temperature and concentration of the chemical species.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical simulation for various geometries of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The physics of the cell and the simplifying assumptions are presented; a sketch of the numerical procedure is also given.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical simulation for various geometries of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The numerical results obtained with hydrogen as the fuel are compared with results from other simulation codes which were developed for a planar geometry.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical simulation for various geometries of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The numerical results show the behaviour of the potential, temperature and current distributions when certain parameters (geometry of the cell, electrolyte materials, temperature in the channels) are varied.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical simulation for various geometries of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Numerical simulation is also used to obtain an optimum for some geometry parameters such as cathode thickness or rib width.
Titulo: Three-dimensional numerical simulation for various geometries of solid oxide fuel cells
